EffectOverlay.formulaRequirement: #program; var character = Array::getValueForKey(System::script, 'ObjectInstance'); if(Object::getVariableAsNumber(character, 'RoboFunzoAttached')) { var directionX = Character::getDirectionX(character); var directionZ = Character::getDirectionZ(character); if((directionX==-1 && directionZ==0) || (directionX==0 && directionZ==1)|| (directionX==0 && directionZ==0) || (directionX==0 && directionZ==2) || (directionX==-2 && directionZ==0)) { return true; } } return false;

#program; var character = Array::getValueForKey(System::script, 'ObjectInstance'); if(Object::getVariableAsNumber(character, 'RoboFunzoAttached')) { var directionX = Character::getDirectionX(character); var directionZ = Character::getDirectionZ(character); if((directionX==0 && directionZ==-1) || (directionX==1 && directionZ==0) || (directionX==0 && directionZ==-2) ||(directionX==2 && directionZ==0)) { return true; } } return false;
#program; var character = Array::getValueForKey(System::script, 'ObjectInstance'); if(Object::getVariableAsNumber(character, 'RoboFunzoDestroyed')) { return true; } return false;
